name: Labyrinth of Zangetsu: Akiba's Trip Collaboration - Additional Characters Pack
summary:
Atmospheric turn-based dungeon crawler with Japanese yokai folklore reimagined!
AKIBA'S TRIP characters entering the world of Labyrinth of Zangetsu.
This DLC will add 8 characters as playable characters to Labyrinth of Zangetsu from "Akiba's Trip".
